Package controllers

Class OrderScreenController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AbstractController
controllers.AbstractOrderController
controllers.OrderScreenController
public class OrderScreenController extends AbstractOrderController
This class handles the items picking (Cart) process for an order. it shows every item in the catalog (picrute,name,price) it also have a cart view, the user can add item from the catalog to his cart.

    • setUp

      public void setUp(Object... objects)
      this method call on loading fxml. initialize the entire controller, call super to start timer, raise discount popup if needed, set store_id property of order. and add all product to invite summary.
      Overrides:
      setUp in class AbstractOrderController
      Parameters:
      objects - - can receive multiple objects
      See Also:
      • OrderDetails

    • checkout

      public void checkout(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Occur when checkout button clicked set items,discount,total_price properties of order and switch to next screen.
      Parameters:
      event - action event.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • back

      public void back(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the mouse event of the back button. If the configuration is OL, it opens the "OrderMethodForm" window. If the configuration is EK, it returns to "CustomerPanel" window.
      Overrides:
      back in class AbstractOrderController
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event that triggered this method
